description:
Brook tells Franky and Robin the secret to slaying zombies, and Gecko Moria reveals the terrifying monster that will be the recipient of Luffy`s shadow!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le guerrier à la réputation de démon ! Oz revient à la vie !
Majin to Yobareta Senshi!! Oz Fukkatsu no Toki
The Warrior Known As the `Devil`!! The Moment of Oars` Revival!
Воин, называемый демоном! Время восстания Оза!
魔人と呼ばれた戦士!! オーズ復活の時
